short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid distractions on youtube.Provide ease in using YouTube simultaneously with other application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. While using YouTube cover other part than video player.
2. Pauses player when we switches tabs.
3. By " ctrl + shift + Z " video player size reduces and we can see video with any other application.
